mainCards.name: Marshmallon
mainCards.description: "Cannot be destroyed by battle. After damage calculation, if this card was attacked, and was face-down at the start of the Damage Step: The attacking player takes 1000 damage."

mainCards.name: Scanner
mainCards.description: "Once per turn, you can select 1 of your opponent's monsters that is removed from play. Until the End Phase, this card's name is treated as the selected monster's name, and this card has the same Attribute, Level, ATK, and DEF as the selected monster. If this card is removed from the field while this effect is applied, remove it from play."

mainCards.name: Baby dragon
mainCards.description: "Much more than just a child, this dragon is gifted with untapped power."

mainCards.name: Crawling dragon
mainCards.description: "This weakened dragon can no longer fly, but is still a deadly force to be reckoned with."

mainCards.name: Warrior Dai Grepher
mainCards.description: The warrior who can manipulate dragons. Nobody knows his mysterious past.

mainCards.name: Bitron
mainCards.description: A new species found in electronic space. There's not much information on it.

mainCards.name: Spiral Serpent
mainCards.description: "When huge whirlpools lay cities asunder, it is the hunger of this sea serpent at work. No one has ever escaped its dreaded Spiral Wave to accurately describe the terror they experienced."

mainCards.name: Skull Guardian
mainCards.description: "This monster can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Spell Card, ""Novox's Prayer"". You must also offer monsters whose total Level Stars equal 7 or more as a Tribute from the field or your hand."

mainCards.name: Terratiger, the Empowered Warrior
mainCards.description: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Normal Monster from your hand in Defense Position.

mainCards.name: Curtain of the dark ones
mainCards.description: "A curtain that a spellcaster made, it is said to raise a dark power."

mainCards.name: Yomi Ship
mainCards.description: If this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: Destroy the monster that destroyed this card.

mainCards.name: Wattkid
mainCards.description: A creature that electrocutes opponents with bolts of lightning.

mainCards.name: Alexandrite Dragon
mainCards.description: "Many of the czars' lost jewels can be found in the scales of this priceless dragon. Its creator remains a mystery, along with how they acquired the imperial treasures. But whosoever finds this dragon has hit the jackpot... whether they know it or not."

mainCards.name: Herald of Creation
mainCards.description: "Once per turn: You can discard 1 card, then target 1 Level 7 or higher monster in your Graveyard; add that target to your hand."

mainCards.name: Battle warrior
mainCards.description: A warrior that fights with his bare hands!!!

mainCards.name: Texchanger
mainCards.description: "Once per turn, when your monster is targeted for an attack: You can negate that attack, then Special Summon 1 Cyberse Normal Monster from your hand, Deck, or GY."

mainCards.name: Gate Guardian
mainCards.description: "Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by Tributing 1 ""Sanga of the Thunder"", ""Kazejin"", and ""Suijin""."

mainCards.name: Man-Eater Bug
mainCards.description: FLIP: Target 1 monster on the field, destroy that target.

mainCards.name: Leotron
mainCards.description: A territorial electronic monster that guards its own domain.

mainCards.name: Crab Turtle
mainCards.description: "This monster can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Spell Card, ""Turtle Oath"". You must also offer monsters whose total Level Stars equal 8 or more as a Tribute from the field or your hand."

mainCards.name: Mirage Dragon
mainCards.description: Your opponent cannot activate Trap Cards during the Battle Phase.

mainCards.name: Dark magician
mainCards.description: The ultimate wizard in terms of attack and defense.

mainCards.name: Axe Raider
mainCards.description: An axe-wielding monster of tremendous strength and agility.

mainCards.name: Wattaildragon
mainCards.description: "Capable of indefinite flight. Attacks by wrapping its body with electricity and ramming into opponents. IMPORTANT: Capturing the ""Wattaildragon"" is forbidden by the Ancient Rules and is a Level 6 offense, the minimum sentence for which is imprisonment for no less than 2500 heliocycles."

mainCards.name: Battle OX
mainCards.description: "A monster with tremendous power, it destroys enemies with a swing of its axe."

mainCards.name: Command Knight
mainCards.description: "All Warrior-Type monsters you control gain 400 ATK. If you control another monster, monsters your opponent controls cannot target this card for an attack."

mainCards.name: Feral Imp
mainCards.description: "A playful little fiend that lurks in the dark, waiting to attack an unwary enemy."

mainCards.name: The Calculator
mainCards.description: The ATK of this card is the combined Levels of all face-up monsters you control x 300.

mainCards.name: Suijin
mainCards.description: "During damage calculation in your opponent's turn, if this card is being attacked: You can target the attacking monster; make that target's ATK 0 during damage calculation only (this is a Quick Effect). This effect can only be used once while this card is face-up on the field."

mainCards.name: Beast King Barbaros
mainCards.description: "You can Normal Summon/Set this card without Tributing, but its original ATK becomes 1900. You can Tribute 3 monsters to Tribute Summon (but not Set) this card. If Summoned this way: Destroy all cards your opponent controls."

mainCards.name: The Tricky
mainCards.description: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by discarding 1 card.

mainCards.name: Dark Blade
mainCards.description: "They say he is a dragon-manipulating warrior from the dark world. His attack is tremendous, using his great swords with vicious power."

mainCards.name: Fireyarou
mainCards.description: A malevolent creature wrapped in flames that attacks enemies with intense fire.

mainCards.name: Haniwa
mainCards.description: An earthen figure that protects the tomb of an ancient ruler.

mainCards.name: Silver Fang
mainCards.description: "A snow wolf that's beautiful to the eye, but absolutely vicious in battle."

mainCards.name: Exploder Dragon
mainCards.description: If this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: Destroy the monster that destroyed it. Neither player takes any battle damage from attacks involving this attacking card.

mainCards.name: Horn Imp
mainCards.description: "A small fiend that dwells in the dark, its single horn makes it a formidable opponent."

mainCards.name: Flame manipulator
mainCards.description: "This Spellcaster attacks enemies with fire-related spells such as ""Sea of Flames"" and ""Wall of Fire""."

mainCards.name: Blue-Eyes white dragon
mainCards.description: "This legendary dragon is a powerful engine of destruction. Virtually invincible, very few have faced this awesome creature and lived to tell the tale."

mainCards.name: Slot Machine
mainCards.description: The machine's ability is said to vary according to its slot results.

mainCards.name: Hero of the east
mainCards.description: Feel da strength ah dis sword-swinging samurai from da Far East.

mainCards.name: Supply Squad
mainCards.description: "Once per turn, if a monster(s) you control is destroyed by battle or card effect: Draw 1 card."

mainCards.name: Torrential Tribute
mainCards.description: When a monster(s) is Summoned: Destroy all monsters on the field.

mainCards.name: Change of Heart
mainCards.description: Target 1 monster your opponent controls, take control of it until the End Phase.

mainCards.name: Vanity's Emptiness
mainCards.description: Neither player can Special Summon monsters. If a card is sent from the Deck or the field to your Graveyard: Destroy this card.

mainCards.name: Magnum Shield
mainCards.description: "Equip only to a Warrior-Type monster. Apply this effect, depending on its battle position. ● Attack Position: It gains ATK equal to its original DEF. ● Defense Position: It gains DEF equal to its original ATK."

mainCards.name: Sword of dark destruction
mainCards.description: A DARK monster equipped with this card increases its ATK by 400 points and decreases its DEF by 200 points.

mainCards.name: Harpie's Feather Duster
mainCards.description: Destroy all Spells and Traps your opponent controls.

mainCards.name: Ring of defense
mainCards.description: When a Trap effect that inflicts damage is activated: Make that effect damage 0.

mainCards.name: Spell Absorption
mainCards.description: "Each time a Spell Card is activated, gain 500 Life Points immediately after it resolves."

mainCards.name: Mystical space typhoon
mainCards.description: Target 1 Spell/Trap on the field, destroy that target.

mainCards.name: Umiiruka
mainCards.description: Increase the ATK of all WATER monsters by 500 points and decrease their DEF by 400 points.

mainCards.name: Time Seal
mainCards.description: Skip the Draw Phase of your opponent's next turn.

mainCards.name: Black Pendant
mainCards.description: The equipped monster gains 500 ATK. When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

mainCards.name: Terraforming
mainCards.description: Add 1 Field Spell from your Deck to your hand.

mainCards.name: Negate Attack
mainCards.description: "When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target the attacking monster; negate the attack, then end the Battle Phase."

mainCards.name: Mind Crush
mainCards.description: "Declare 1 card name; if that card is in your opponent's hand, they must discard all copies of it, otherwise you discard 1 random card."

mainCards.name: United We Stand
mainCards.description: The equipped monster gains 800 ATK/DEF for each face-up monster you control.

mainCards.name: Magic Jamamer
mainCards.description: "When a Spell Card is activated: Discard 1 card; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it."

mainCards.name: Magic Cylinder
mainCards.description: "When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target the attacking monster; negate the attack, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to its ATK."

mainCards.name: Mirror Force
mainCards.description: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Destroy all your opponent's Attack Position monsters.

mainCards.name: Forest
mainCards.description: "All Insect, Beast, Plant, and Beast-Warrior monsters on the field gain 200 ATK/DEF."

mainCards.name: Trap Hole
mainCards.description: When your opponent Normal or Flip Summons 1 monster with 1000 or more ATK: Target that monster, destroy that target.

mainCards.name: Monster Reborn
mainCards.description: Target 1 monster in either GY, Special Summon it.

mainCards.name: Advanced Ritual Art
mainCards.description: This card can be used to Ritual Summon any 1 Ritual Monster. You must also send Normal Monsters from your Deck to the Graveyard whose total Levels equal the Level of that Ritual Monster.

mainCards.name: Twin Twisters
mainCards.description: "Discard 1 card, then target up to 2 Spells/Traps on the field; destroy them."

mainCards.name: Raigeki
mainCards.description: Destroy all monsters your opponent controls.

mainCards.name: Solemn Warning
mainCards.description: "When a monster(s) would be Summoned, OR when a Spell/Trap Card, or monster effect, is activated that includes an effect that Special Summons a monster(s): Pay 2000 LP; negate the Summon or activation, and if you do, destroy it."

mainCards.name: Swords of Revealing Light
mainCards.description: "After this card's activation, it remains on the field, but destroy it during the End Phase of your opponent's 3rd turn. When this card is activated: If your opponent controls a face-down monster, flip all monsters they control face-up. While this card is face-up on the field, your opponent's monsters cannot declare an attack."

mainCards.name: Closed Forest
mainCards.description: All Beast-Type monsters you control gain 100 ATK for each monster in your Graveyard. Field Spell Cards cannot be activated. Field Spell Cards cannot be activated during the turn this card is destroyed.

mainCards.name: Pot of Greed
mainCards.description: Draw 2 cards.

mainCards.name: Yami
mainCards.description: "All Fiend and Spellcaster monsters on the field gain 200 ATK/DEF, also all Fairy monsters on the field lose 200 ATK/DEF."

mainCards.name: Messenger of peace
mainCards.description: "Monsters with 1500 or more ATK cannot declare an attack. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase, pay 100 LP or destroy this card."

mainCards.name: Call of The Haunted
mainCards.description: "Activate this card by targeting 1 monster in your GY; Special Summon that target in Attack Position. When this card leaves the field, destroy that monster. When that monster is destroyed, destroy this card."

mainCards.name: Wall of Revealing Light
mainCards.description: Activate by paying any multiple of 1000 Life Points. Monsters your opponent controls cannot attack if their ATK is less than or equal to the amount you paid.

mainCards.name: Dark Hole
mainCards.description: Destroy all monsters on the field.

mainCards.name: Marshmallon
mainCards.description: "Cannot be destroyed by battle. After damage calculation, if this card was attacked, and was face-down at the start of the Damage Step: The attacking player takes 1000 damage."

mainCards.name: Scanner
mainCards.description: "Once per turn, you can select 1 of your opponent's monsters that is removed from play.
